title: 6/20/17 -  Is the left fine with violence? (Steven Kotler Joins Glenn)
description:
Remembering Otto Warmbier ...North Korea is pushing the world closer to war ...Sending Stu to North Korea ...The left is rooting for President Trump's implosion ...Careful what you wish for, liberals! ...Steven Kotler and 'Stealing Fire' ...How to get 'into the flow' and expand our minds

The Glenn Beck Program with Glenn Beck, Pat Gray, Stu Burguiere and Jeff Fisher, Weekdays 9a–12pm ET on TheBlaze Radio
